itemDescription: British businessman and Conservative Party politician (born 1932)

wikipedia_page.main: John Wakeham, Baron Wakeham,  (born 22 June 1932) is a British businessman and Conservative Party politician. Between 1998 and 2012, he was chancellor of Brunel University, and since then has been its chancellor emeritus.He was a director of Enron from 1994 until its bankruptcy in 2001.
